4. Voice Culture and Singing.--"The very best school for voice culture is the home. Study in every way not to annoy, but to cultivate a soft voice, distinct and plain. Thus mothers may become teachers in the home. Mothers should themselves act like Christ, speaking tender, loving words 
                                                                           5
in the home; then opposite their names in the book of heaven will be written, 'Ye are laborers together with God.' . . . Avoid everything that will be rasping to your children."--MS., Sept. 24, 1898.
